title: BROKE vs PRO Gaming Setups!

Get $25, Absolutely Free:  Check out the Micro Center Custom PC Builder:    AOC 24G2 23.8" Full HD (1920 x 1080) 144Hz Gaming Monitor:  AOC AG493UCX 49" 5K (5120 x 1440) 120Hz Ultrawide Curved Screen Gaming Monitor:  PowerSpec G511 Gaming PC:  ROCCAT Elo X Wired Gaming Headset:  Razer Goliathus Mobile Stealth Edition Gaming Mouse Mat:  SteelSeries Apex 3 TKL Mechanical Gaming Keyboard:  Logitech G G502 HERO Gaming Mouse:  Kanto DS150 Universal Phone and Tablet Stand with Mounting Bracket:  Creative Labs Pebble 2 Computer Stereo Speakers:  Innex PS2 Controller:  CAD Audio U29 Content Creator Starter Pack With USB Mic, Mic Arm, and Pop Filter:  Glorious PC Gaming Race Coiled Cable 4.5 ft.:  Glorious PC Gaming Race Kailh Mechanical Keyboard Switches  Silver:  Savage RGB Tabletop Ring Light with Stand, Mirror and Phone Holder:  Glorious PC Gaming Race PBT Keycaps - Caribbean Ocean:  Power A Enhanced Wired Controller Series X/S  Red:  SteelSeries QcK Prism Cloth  XL:  Lego Star Wars Luke Skywalkers X-Wing Fighter 75301:  Glorious PC Gaming Race Tenkeyless Wooden Mechanical Keyboard Ergonomic Palm Rest:  Logitech StreamCam, 1080P HD 60fps Streaming Webcam:  Glorious PC Gaming Race Model O Wireless Gaming Mouse:  Glorious PC Gaming Race GMMK Tenkeyless RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard:  Satechi Aluminum USB Headset Stand:  Blue Yeti USB Condenser Microphone:  Audio-Technica ATH-M50X Professional Monitor Wired Headphones:   Subscribe to Ken's channel @Denki!  More shenanigans on @thisis:   My new F1 show @TheBackmarkers!  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:
